channel.title: 0.8.26 Patch Notes
channel.description: ## New Lobby Features * **Friends list can now add "Notes"** (max 20 characters). Remember that person you added instead of calling them "hey...you...!" * **Friends list now sorts by IN-MATCH, followed by ONLINE!** No need to infinite scroll through your many friends to scout who is online. * **Friends list back-end got a revamp for stability and performance --** after all, we offer _unlimited_ friend slots! Need to make sure they don't explode after 100000 friend added. * **Minor back-end Discord integration added** to prep for the future. More importantly, the **stats of who is currently online** within the lobby is added to the Discord button **and moved above to the lobby stats area**. This should better help people understand **why Discord is _required_ for Alpha/Beta**. ## Bug Fixes * Fixed friends list display bug

item.title: 0.8.26 Patch Notes
item.dc:creator: í42-Xblade
item.description:
New Lobby Features

  • Friends list can now add “Notes” (max 20 characters). Remember that person you added instead of calling them “hey…you…!”

  • Friends list now sorts by IN-MATCH, followed by ONLINE! No need to infinite scroll through your many friends to scout who is online.

  • Friends list back-end got a revamp for stability and performance – after all, we offer unlimited friend slots! Need to make sure they don’t explode after 100000 friend added.

  • Minor back-end Discord integration added to prep for the future. More importantly, the stats of who is currently online within the lobby is added to the Discord button and moved above to the lobby stats area. This should better help people understand why Discord is required for Alpha/Beta.

Bug Fixes

  • Fixed friends list display bug
